thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com | 3 de 391
thread.title: Christina Renken

author: Christina Renken
title: Christina Renken
text:
After the negative reviews I was a bit sceptical, but I decided that I'm gonna try the service from FloraQueen.
My girlfriend lives in Palma da Mallorca (I live in Germany) and I wanted to send her roses for Valentine's Day. On February 7 I odered everything and the roses arrived today (February 14) very early and on time around 10:30am in an amazing quality.
Everyone who wants to see a picture of the roses can send me a message!
I'm impressed in a positive way and will keep FloraQueen in the back of my mind for more upcoming events. I can only recommend the delivery of flowers through FloraQueen!
